Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: stephie_91
Reviews.Content: travelled hotel 31st march 3 nights hotel staff friendly helpful couldnt 503 shown round shown safe read review werent batteries werent key instead mini fridge didnt expect basis nice surprise cleaned everyday towels changed hotel fantastic location heart gothic quarter 10 min walk la rambla 20 min plaza catalunya near cruise terminal shopping centre harbour aquarium cinema overall hotel brilliant wouldnt hesitate return clean nicely decorated fantastic location staff friendly thanks stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location with a clean, comfortable and spacious room.”

Reviews.Content: am solo female traveler time barcelona stayed hotel 2 nights trip location walk gothic quarter close cathedral santa maria del mar absolutely gorgeous especially night lots restaurants nearby easily walk waterfront hotel year’s eve walked fireworks water immediate craziness las ramblas year’s location perfect relatively close metro stop hotels barcelona safe mindful walk deserted streets little alleys woman traveling downside hotel internet wasn’t organizing elements trip fly annoying starbucks internet cafes online don’t idea trouble staying otherwise staff hotel bed comfortable shower spray onto floor towel fine spalike raining shower head didn’t liked water pressure wasn’t strong justice regardless nice hotel overall

Reviews.Content: pros hotel nice renovated clean located 1015 minutes walking distance major sites metro bus stations close hotel staff friendly breakfast ok ive seen hotels bad believe choose hotel visit barcelona cons 2 hotel distorted stay 1 booking hotel soundproof completely true hotel located noisy street hard sleep noise stop throughout night course windows sound proof walls thin heard neighbours taking shower smth else 2 stayed hotel 7 nights key discharged twice disturbing tired late night 5th floor key wont door staff behaved ok sorry recommend hotel
